# obj file generated by Rust
set(OBJ_FROM_RUST ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../lib/cpp_closures.o)

link_directories(../../rust/violas-client/target/release)

add_executable(deployment src/main.cpp)

target_link_libraries(deployment violas_client violas_sdk ${OBJ_FROM_RUST})

install(TARGETS deployment DESTINATION bin)
